Package org.neo4j.storageengine.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AllNodeScan
    Marker interface for maintaining state for batched all-node scans
    AllRelationshipsScan
    Marker interface for maintaining state for batched all-relationship scans
    CommandCreationContext
    A context which StorageEngine hands out to clients and which gets passed back in to calls about creating commands.
    CommandReader
    Reads commands from a channel.
    CommandReaderFactory
    Provides CommandReader instances for specific versions.
    CommandsToApply
    Group of commands to apply onto StorageEngine, as well as reference to CommandsToApply.next() group of commands.
    CommandStream
    A stream of commands from one or more transactions, that can be serialized to a transaction log or applied to a store.
    ConstraintRuleAccessor  
    Degrees
    Holds data about degrees for various combinations of relationship type and Direction, retrieved from a node.
    Degrees.Mutator  
    EntityTokenUpdateListener  
    IndexUpdateListener  
    LogFilesInitializer  
    LogVersionRepository  
    MetadataProvider
    Provider for metadata that describes stores properties, ids, store level implementation details
    NodePropertyAccessor
    Used by the index populator for verifying constraints, if need be.
    ReadTracer  
    RelationshipSelection.Criterion  
    RelationshipVisitor<EXCEPTION extends Exception>
    Visitor of relationship data.
    RelationshipVisitor.Home
    Objects which can accept these visitors should implement this interface.
    Scan
    Marker interface for maintaining state for batched scans
    StorageCommand
    A command representing one unit of change to a StorageEngine.
    StorageCommand.TokenCommand  
    StorageCursor
    Base interface for a cursor accessing and reading data as part of StorageReader.
    StorageEngine
    A StorageEngine provides the functionality to durably store data, and read it back.
    StorageEngineFactory
    A factory suitable for something like service-loading to load StorageEngine instances.
    StorageEntityCursor
    A StorageCursor for entities, i.e. which has properties.
    StorageEntityScanCursor<S extends Scan>  
    StorageNodeCursor
    Cursor over nodes and its data.
    StorageProperty
    Abstraction pairing property key token id and property value.
    StoragePropertyCursor
    Cursor that can read property data.
    StorageReader
    Abstraction for accessing data from a StorageEngine.
    StorageRelationshipCursor
    Shared interface between the two StorageRelationshipScanCursor and StorageRelationshipTraversalCursor.
    StorageRelationshipScanCursor
    Cursor over relationships.
    StorageRelationshipTraversalCursor  
    StorageSchemaReader  
    StoreIdProvider  
    StoreVersion  
    StoreVersionCheck  
    TransactionIdStore
    Keeps a latest transaction id.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountsDelta
    An in-memory single-threaded counts holder useful for modifying and reading counts transaction state.
    CountsDelta.RelationshipKey  
    EntityTokenUpdate  
    EntityTokenUpdateListener.Adapter  
    EntityUpdates
    Represent events related to property changes due to entity addition, deletion or update.
    EntityUpdates.Builder  
    EntityUpdates.PropertyValue  
    ExternalStoreId  
    IndexCapabilities  
    IndexEntryUpdate<INDEX_KEY extends SchemaDescriptorSupplier>
    Subclasses of this represent events related to property changes due to property or label addition, deletion or update.
    IndexUpdateListener.Adapter  
    PropertyKeyValue
    Default implementation of StorageProperty where the Value has already been materialized.
    RelationshipSelection
    Used to specify a selection of relationships to get from a node.
    RelationshipSelection.CriterionImpl  
    RelationshipSelection.Directional  
    RelationshipSelection.DirectionalAllTypes  
    RelationshipSelection.DirectionalMultipleTypes  
    RelationshipSelection.DirectionalSingleCriterion  
    RelationshipSelection.DirectionalSingleType  
    StandardConstraintRuleAccessor  
    StorageFilesState
    Holds information about storage files for a specific store.
    StoreFileMetadata  
    StoreId  
    StoreVersionCheck.Result  
    TransactionId
    Transaction id plus meta data that says something about its contents, for comparison.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandVersion
    Many commands have before/after versions of their records.
    EntityUpdates.PropertyValueType  
    IndexCapabilities.ConfigCapability
    Indicate how index configuration is persisted.
    IndexCapabilities.IndexProviderCapability
    Indicate what set of index providers are present in a given version.
    IndexCapabilities.LuceneCapability
    Oh dear... so what does Lucene stuff do in the storage engine API???
    RecoveryState  
    RelationshipDirection
    Low level representation of relationship direction, used to keep traversal state and query tx-state Given the graph a -[r1]-> b a <-[r2]- b a -[r3]-> a Then a.getRelationships( OUTGOING ) => r1 a.getRelationships( INCOMING ) => r2 a.getRelationships( LOOP ) => r3 Note that this contrasts with /** @see #org.neo4j.graphdb.Direction(long), where a.getRelationships( org.neo4j.graphdb.Direction.OUTGOING ) => r1, r3 a.getRelationships( org.neo4j.graphdb.Direction.INCOMING ) => r2, r3 a.getRelationships( org.neo4j.graphdb.Direction.BOTH ) => r1, r2, r3
    StoreVersionCheck.Outcome  
    TransactionApplicationMode
    Mode of applying transactions.
    UpdateMode
